text: Dina Wadia (15 August 1919 â€“ 2 November 2017) was an Indian political figure. She was born in London. Her father was Muhammad Ali Jinnah. She was married to Neville Wadia from 1938 until they divorced in 1943. Wadia died at her home in New York City of pneumonia on 2 November 2017 at the age of 98. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2017 deaths Category:People from Mumbai
title: Dina Wadia
